content: mini - cast away socks by lison knits the #minicastawaysocks are worked toe-up in the round using basic knitting techniques the toe is made using judy s magic cast-on method the heel is shaped using a forethought heel and the cuff has a 1 1 ribbing materials needles yarn polo by mondial 3mm double pointed knitting needles 50 g/200 m or 3mm circular needles magic loop gauge size 3-6 month old baby 25 stitches x 32 row = 10x10 cm abbreviations sts stitches m1l make one left ssk slip slip knit k knit m1r make one right k2tog knit two together pattern toe using 3 mm needles cast on 18 sts using the judy s magic cast-on method https //youtu be/_tkaac6htti si=7l165kltys9yuqzg set up your sts by knitting the first row and k through the back loop of twisted sts k another round work in the round - r1 *k1 m1l k until 1 sts left on the needle m1r k1* repeat ** on the other needle - r2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 for 3 times you now have 30 sts foot work in stockinette for 6 cm change this length based on how long you want your sock take into consideration that the heel will add 2-4 cm to have a perfect fit knit the foot until reaching the start of the ankle if you make stripes here is a quick tutorial on how to carry yarn that will save you from weaving in all the ends https //youtu be/hpgfrdqqr8q si=sf0qifh8orr3s3ff and here is a tutorial on how to avoid jogs when changing colors https //youtu be/w-_fpyd4dgq si=ej1xpmxs_q-uxygv forethought heel placement using a scrap yarn knit across half of your stitches then start again from the beginning of the round knitting over the scrap yarn if you are making your socks striped it looks best if you insert a heel between two stripes leg work in stockinette for 4 cm following the color scheme of the foot ^ change this length based on how long you want your sock cuff with ribbing and cast off when you reach the desired length knit 3 row *knit 1 purl 1* ** to the end of the row for 4 row k all stitches for another row cast off using the a stretchy bind off images at https //ysolda com/blogs/journal/3-stretchy-bind-offs - step 1 k 2 sts - step 2 k these 2 sts together through the back loop - step 3 k 1 st from the left needle repeat steps 2 and 3 until 2 sts are left then work step 2 once more forethought heel construction https //youtu be/kttj8f83fx4 t=1006 pick up the stitches in the row above and below the scrap yarn be sure it s half of your stitch count unravel the scrap yarn or trim it k across one side of the heel pick up two stitches on this side k across the other side of the heel and pick up the same amount
